Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a configured item containing the specified system item.

Parameter.Name: systemItem
Parameter.Abstract: The system item to use as the item representation. One of the constants defined in UIBarButtonSystemItem.

Parameter.Name: action
Parameter.Abstract: The block that gets fired on the button press.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Newly initialized item with the specified properties.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a configured item using the specified image and style.

Parameter.Name: image
Parameter.Abstract: The itemâ€™s image. If nil an image is not displayed. If this image is too large to fit on the bar, it is scaled to fit The size of a toolbar and navigation bar image is 20 x 20 points.

Parameter.Name: style
Parameter.Abstract: The style of the item. One of the constants defined in UIBarButtonItemStyle.

Parameter.Name: action
Parameter.Abstract: The block that gets fired on the button press.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Newly initialized item with the specified properties.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a configured item using the specified text and style.

Parameter.Name: title
Parameter.Abstract: The text displayed on the button item.

Parameter.Name: style
Parameter.Abstract: The style of the item. One of the constants defined in UIBarButtonItemStyle.

Parameter.Name: action
Parameter.Abstract: The block that gets fired on the button press.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Newly initialized item with the specified properties.
